content: Hello everyone and welcome to this long-awaited second pre-sale of a Gold coin!As you all know, we started the year 2022 with a Pre Sale of Gold Coins, these are Fine Gold 999.9 Poker chips, one of the largest coins in the 1HoDLCLUB, 45g of Fine Gold 999.9! So we're going to finish it off with a pre-sale of a Gold coin!  the last gold coin was 45g to arrive in 39mm format and 33 coins mint! the one to come will be exactly 1oz or 31g of Fine Gold 999.9, which will come in at a size of 32mm and 33 coins mint!the design of this coin will be close to the 1oz Fine Silver GENESIS coin!!this Gold coin will be limited to 33 coins, one of the rarest mint of all the 1HoDLCLUB collections produced until today after the Fine Gold 999.9 Poker chips! The slots marked reserved are the serial numbers recovered by the participants of the first pre sale! this proposal will be made again in 2023 but for the participants of the first pre sale of 2023 for the second pre sale!the pre-sale is open throughout the month of September., the remaining slots will be taken by me!In the sale price are included, the coin, the COA, the box and the goodies.And covered by myself will be delivered to you a 0.5 troy ounce pure Silver coin [0.5 troy ounce to fit the same diameter as the 1oz Fine Gold 999.9 coin], with the same design as the Gold coin, loaded with 0.0021 BTC with the same serial number as your Gold coin, this coin will also be delivered with its box and COA, these coins will be a gift from me, there will be no more than the number of gold coins minted, and will never be sold separately by the 1HoDLCLUB.!Price : 2950$ per coin + 0.021 BTC for the loading (Don't send the loading at the pre payments)BTC Payment AddressBTC [Legacy] : New address to come for the second batch of production.BTC [Segwit] : New address to come for the second batch of production.each coins will be delivered with its box, capsule as well as its certificate of authenticity.and also stickers specially designed for this gold coin, which will only be delivered with it! and the famous matching 0.5 Troy ounce Fine Silver coins.The design of the Fine Gold 999.9 GENESIS Coin will be close to the 1oz Fine Silver GENESIS coin!, with a few different details, the hologram is completely different! it is currently in production and unique to this new piece!As explained during the first pre-sale,, I am not a big fan of pre sale and pre orders, because there is the expectation of buyers in part, but without pre sale for this kind of collectibles I could not produce 33 for sales afterwards, and that's why I'm organizing this pre sales.The Price is 2950$ + 0.021BTC for the loadingBecause it is the number of pieces that had been made at the first Pre Sale of Gold coin. and this number will not be exceeded for 1HoDLCLUB Gold coins. however, it may be reduced over time for the next pre-sales!Since I will get ahead by producing the boxes, COA and hologram in advance[The Coa is in production at the moment and the hologram go to the production tomorrow!] the time to production it will be between 1 to 2 months maximum between the moment of payment of the production and the arrival of the coins in hand.the pre sale will be open all September, the remaining slots will be taken by me!Participants who paid before September 10, your coins will be put into production on the 12th, the time I make the transfer for payment of the production, the rest you will have until September 30 and your coins will be put into production on October 2! this way the first to pay won't have to wait for everyone else to pay!- 1st option -I can send you the coin with a low value customs declaration like the last time but if the coin is lost I could not refund you the value of the coin, only the loading.- 2nd option -We will use DHL Express with full coins value declaration so the package will be insured and in case of loss I will refund you directly and behind me will also be refunded by the carrier.this time, the coin, the box, the COA and the goodies will all be sent in the same package! .For this pre sale diffrent option is available to you, you can pay in BTC, LTC, USDT, USDC [For other payment address contact me in PM](or other known crypto because in any case the funds are directly converted into USDT and then paid into a bank account to pay for the production of the coins.)However the loading part will have to be paid in BTC!Please do not send the part for loading during the pre-payment, this is easier for me.and of course it is limited to 3
